articles.title: Omicron threat looms over winter holidays in Europe and U.S. - Reuters
articles.description: The Netherlands went into lockdown on Sunday and the possibility of more COVID-19 restrictions being imposed ahead of the Christmas and New Year holidays loomed over several European countries as the Omicron variant spreads rapidly.

articles.title: James Webb Space Telescope given revised 24 December launch - RNZ
